text: good morning! happy tuesday!
Hello
how was your weekend?
it was good, just enjoying the long weekend
i ran a 5k for the save the children charity. have you heard of it?
Yes I am familar with that charity, but not too familiar. Tell me more

it is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. It's a great cause. Would you consider making a donation? even something small would help.
Yes that seems like something I would love to do
great! you can do it after this HIT. It's easy and will help the children! do you have kids?
I do not, I'm only 20
ok, maybe one day! are you in college?
Yes I am1
good for you! what is your major?
I am studying Computer Engineering
excellent. you will have no problem getting a job. good for you. i was accounting then went to law school.
oh that sounds interesting
it's not! it's boring work. you are smart to go into a field that has fun projects.
It's still a lot of work
it is but you will get paid really well. good choice. stick with it. get your masters.
Yeah I am planning to do an MBA
